meaning_str.bing:
v. 邀请；要求；招致（尤指坏事）
n. 邀请；请柬
网络. 招待；吸引；请求

邀请；要求；招致（尤指坏事）

（正式）邀请（某人参加活动或前往某地）；征求（意见、帮助等）；招致（尤指坏事）；吸引；诱发；鼓励

1.en: It is daring of Mr Kelly to invite such a direct comparison of his theories to the ramblings of a madman.
1.cn: 凯利竟胆敢将自己的理论直接比作一个疯子的乱七八糟的布局。

2.en: Monitoring our comments behind the wall of an invite-only, password-protected site might seem like a bit of a reach.
2.cn: 监视我们在受邀才能加入、有密码保护的网站上发表的评论看似有点过分。

3.en: Invite friends over for the first cookout of the season. Make it a potluck!
3.cn: 在这个季节邀请朋友去郊外野炊。要经常这样哦！

0.en: So why didn't you invite Conway? Brockhart was invited instead.
0.cn: 你为什么不邀请康威？被邀请的是布洛哈特。

1.en: Your invite has been sent to entire galaxy!
1.cn: 你的邀请函已经发送个全星系了！

2.en: Why did you invite him? I can't stand that guy!
2.cn: 为什么你要邀请他？我无法忍受那个男的！

3.en: Hold on. You're getting married and you didn't invite me?
3.cn: 等等，你们结婚居然没邀请我？

4.en: If you're such good friends, how come he didn't invite you? He's your great-great-grandpa. How come he didn't invite you?
4.cn: 如果你真的是他的朋友，他为什么不邀请你。他是你的曾曾祖父，那他怎么不邀请你呢？

5.en: Wait, Joey's having a party, and he wasn't gonna invite us?
5.cn: 等等，乔伊要开派对，但不邀请我们？

6.en: How come you never invite Sheldon and me on a double date?
6.cn: 你怎么从来不邀请谢尔顿和我参加四人约会呢？

7.en: Just because your name's on the invite doesn't make you a hostess.
7.cn: 不要因为你在邀请之列就把自己当女主人。

8.en: It would be an excellent way to meet new friends. You could invite the militia.
8.cn: 那将是认识新朋友最好的方式，你可以邀请民兵们。

9.en: We're gonna invite all the top buyers, which is why we have to go balls to the wall.
9.cn: 我们要邀请所有的高端买家，所以我们得竭尽全力。

10.en: Turns out Sheldon didn't invite his brother. Now it's starting to sound like a wedding.
10.cn: 我才发现谢尔顿没有邀请他哥哥。现在开始有婚礼的感觉了。

11.en: I think it's a great idea. Yeah, we could have a dinner party and just invite her close friends.
11.cn: 我觉得这主意不错，我们办个晚餐派对，邀请好朋友过来。

12.en: One thing, her ladyship has been kind enough to invite the servants to hear Dame Nellie tomorrow evening.
12.cn: 对了， 夫人好心邀请仆人们明晚一起听内莉夫人演唱。

13.en: Well, then, so just invite me. Please, I was trying to be nice. You're the worst one.
13.cn: 那么，就只邀请我就好了啊/拜托，我只是在说好听的话，你是最糟糕的。

14.en: All right, fine. Hey, can you think of a reason I shouldn't invite Amy to come with me? Nope.
14.cn: 好吧，行，你能想到我不应该邀请艾米跟我一起来的理由吗？没有。

15.en: Sheldon, you tried. What more could you have done? Hey, why didn't you invite him in the first place?
15.cn: 谢尔顿，你尝试过了。你也没有其他办法了？你为什么一开始不邀请他呢？

16.en: Oh. There they are. You know, we have a couple of mixed families in the neighborhood, so I thought I'd invite them over.
16.cn: 他们到了，你知道，我们的邻居有几对混杂的家庭，所以我就邀请他们过来了。

17.en: Oh my God Phoebe, this is impossible. We can't do this by Friday. We have to find a place. We have to invite people. We have to get food.
17.cn: 不可能，我们不可能在星期五办，要找到一个地点，邀请客人，买好食物。

18.en: Honey, his name is Alec. But the C Got smudged. Yeah, well, why don't you just text him and then invite him back for dinner?
18.cn: 亲，他叫艾丽克，但那个"C"被抹花了。对了，你怎么不给他发个短信邀请他来吃晚饭。

19.en: And for those of you who are just beginning that journey to the West and East, I want to invite you today on this amazing journey with me.
19.cn: 如果你刚刚开始这种旅程，去西方或者去东方，那我今天就要邀请你和我一起走。
